name: Le Meurtre Borgia (demo version)
description:
In this 10-minutes demo, you will have access to a few suspects' rooms and testimonies. Try to get as much information as possible about the victim and the suspects and answer a short quiz when the time is up !

Please note : the rooms and suspects selected in the demo won't spoil the finale mystery, however they are both in the demo and in the full version. 

 The full version lasts about 1.5 hours (best teams succeeded in 1h).
